mapper.select: SELECT t.tag_id, t.tag_name FROM blog_tag bt, tag t WHERE bt.blog_id = #{blogId} AND bt.tag_id = t.tag_id
SELECT DISTINCT t.tag_id, t.tag_name, COUNT(bts.tag_id) tag_count FROM tag t LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bts ON t.tag_id = bts.tag_id GROUP BY t.tag_id ORDER BY COUNT(bts.tag_id) DESC
